summary: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.
cast: Scarlett Johansson|Donna Murphy|John Henry Cox|Alicia Keys|Lewis Payton Jr.|Sonnie Brown|Georgina Chapman|Nicholas Art|Jodi Michelle Pynn|Mike Rad|Laura Linney|Joanna Heimbold|Marla Sucharetza|Phoebe Jonas|Allison Sarofim|Tina Benko|Cady Huffman|Kaitlin Hopkins|Reathel Bean|Rosa Nino|Matilda Szydagis|Elle de Amor|Sakina Jaffrey|Alison Wright|Chris Evans|Nate Corddry|Pete Heitmann|Heather Simms|Paul Giamatti|Nina Garbiras|Melisa McGregor|Julie White|Rose Gutierrez|Shalonne Lee|Ilana Levine|Isabel Keating|Patrick Heusinger|Brendan Griffin|Aaron Staton|Stephen O'Reilly|Charlie Hewson|Brande Roderick|Nicola Barber|Kevin Kraft|Nicholas Alexiy Moran|James Urbaniak|Victoria Boothby|Judith Roberts|James Balsamo|Michael Boothroyd|David Boston|Diana Brownstone|Tom Coughlin|Deena Eddy|L.J. Foley|Roy William Gardner|Eli Harris|Bobby Lundon|Jeremy J. Sullivan|Kimmy Suzuki|Lynne Valley|Dany Wolf|Dianne Zaremba
keywords: nanny|manhattan new york city|fish out of water|upper east side manhattan new york city|female protagonist

title: The Nanny Diaries (Diario de una niñera)
